Description: Unique identifier assigned to each review. Numeric starting at 1.
Date and time of review submission.
The score given to the property by the reviewer. Numeric from 1 to 5 inclusive.
Whether property is leased by an agent or privately. Either "Agency" or "Private".
Name of the leasing agent if leased by an agent, blank otherwise.
Type of property. One of "Unit/Flat" or "House".
Number of bedrooms. Numeric starting at 1.
